name: Yume Iroiro
overview: Yume-Iroiro is a dating simulation game in the style of Tokimeki Memorial and other games, but in this game at the beginning the player can choose to be a male or a female character (the male will date girls and the female, boys). The game takes place in a high school and the player can try to date different girls (or boys) and take them to different places. In the game as other dating simulations the player character's is appreciated by the girls (or boys) more or less depending of the answers in the high school or in the dates. The player's character will also have to pass different exams during the game and depending of the answers his class notes will be better or worse and the teachers will like him more or less. The game features japanese voice acting for all the characters, beautiful 2d graphics and different situations and endings depending of the player's choices during the game.
